Class Connect4Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Connect4Model

  • public class Connect4Model
extends java.util.Observable
    This class is made as the model of the connect 4 game. And there are the human and ai player in the game, which decide the input location of the game,
    Version:
    v1
    Author:
    project5 group
    See Also:
    Application
